hero.subtitle: Track your performance with precision. Gain deep insights into your physical capacity and optimize your training like never before.

chat.title: Analytics Chat
chat.user1: Compare my training load from this week to last week.
chat.ai1: Your ATL increased by 15%. Recovery remains stable. Rest tomorrow to optimize.
chat.user2: Should I aim for a higher heart rate in my next zone 2 run?
chat.ai2: Maintain 135-142 bpm. Pushing higher will shift you into zone 3, reducing aerobic adaptations.

problem.title: Data without meaning is just noise.
problem.subtitle: Your wearables collect terabytes of data. But they don't tell you what it means for your life.

pillar1.title: Data Overload
pillar1.text: Thousands of metrics, but no clear focus. You get lost in numbers instead of making progress.

pillar2.title: Missing Context
pillar2.text: Low recovery score? High heart rate? Without the context of your daily life, it's all just guesswork.

pillar3.title: Static Plans
pillar3.text: Classic training plans ignore stress, sleep, and fatigue. YOUB adapts to you, not the other way around.

solution.title: More than a Plan. An intelligent nervous system for your performance.

block1.title: Real-time Adaptivity
block1.text: YOUB doesn't just stubbornly plan ahead. Our AI continuously analyzes your data from Garmin, HRV and sleep. When your body needs rest, YOUB detects it before you slip into overtraining. We replace static plans with dynamic intelligence.

block2.title: A Coach That Speaks to You
block2.text: Don't feel like navigating complex dashboards? YOUB proactively reaches out to you – via WhatsApp or app. Like a real trainer, YOUB gives you feedback, motivates you, or slows you down when necessary. Simple, human, direct.

block3.title: Science Instead of Bro-Science
block3.text: Behind the simple interface works a complex deep learning model, trained with over 1,000 athlete years. Developed with sports scientists and diagnostic experts (HYCYS). Your training is based on valid physiological principles, not chance.

magicMoment.line3: Instead a dialogue that creates clarity.
